name: Mobileappview-php-jsondata
tagline: HTML5 Mobile app view where Json file data is fetched using PHP
body:
Welcome Dear Friends on my Project Page,
       
              This is simply coded app which is used as example of fetching JSON file data using PHP. 
              To give a mobile app view HTML5 coding is done. 
 
How To Use:

To use this example on your local system need to change JSON data path.
          


### Authors and Contributors
            RTZ.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
